starvationevasion.client.GUI

Class GUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • starvationevasion.client.GUI.GUI

  • public class GUI
extends javafx.application.Application
    GUI.java is the class which holds the thread for running the main GUI of starvation evasion The GUI is responsible for drawing the game state on the screen for the user and for receiving user input The GUI displays to the user the the time remaining in the phase, the visualization, data graphs information related to food products, the user's other information relating to the draft. This is how the user interacts with the game
